verses.verse: Let <S%G3049><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> account <S%G3049><s%> of us <S%G2248><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of ministers <S%G5257><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%> of the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
Here <S%G3063><s%>, moreover, <S%G3739><s%> it is required <S%G2212><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> with me <S%G1698><s%> it <S%G1519><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a very small thing <S%G1646><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should be judged <S%G350><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> man <S%G442><s%>'s judgment <S%G2250><s%>: yea <S%G235><s%>, I judge <S%G350><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> mine own self <S%G1683><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G4894><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> against myself <S%G1683><s%>; yet <S%G235><s%> am I <S%G1344><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> hereby5129, 1722 justified <S%G1344><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that judgeth <S%G350><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> judge2919, Acts0 nothing <S%G3361><s%> before4253, Leviticus2 the time <S%G2540><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> come <S%G2064><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> will both <S%G2532><s%> bring to light <S%G5461><s%> the hidden things <S%G2927><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> make manifest <S%G5319><s%> the counsels <S%G1012><s%> of the hearts <S%G2588><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall <S%G1096><s%> each man <S%G1538><s%> have <S%G1096><s%> his praise <S%G1868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, I have in a figure transferred <S%G3345><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sakes <S%G5209><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> ye might learn <S%G3129><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to go <S%G5426><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> are written <S%G1125><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you be puffed up <S%G5448><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> maketh <S%G1252><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> to differ <S%G1252><s%>? and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> hast thou <S%G2192><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G2192><s%> didst <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%>? but if1487, 2532 thou didst receive <S%G2983><s%> it <S%G5101><s%>, why dost thou glory <S%G2744><s%> as if <S%G5613><s%> thou hadst <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> received it <S%G2983><s%>?

Already <S%G2235><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye filled <S%G2880><s%>, already <S%G2235><s%> ye are become rich <S%G4147><s%>, ye have come to reign <S%G936><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: yea and <S%G2532><s%> I would <S%G3785><s%> that <S%G1065><s%> ye did reign <S%G936><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> might reign <S%G4821><s%> with you <S%G5213><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%>, I think <S%G1380><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath set forth <S%G584><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> of all <S%G5613><s%>, as men doomed to death <S%G1935><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> a spectacle <S%G2302><s%> unto the world <S%G2889><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> to angels <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%>.

We <S%G2249><s%> are fools <S%G3474><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s sake, but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are wise <S%G5429><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>; we <S%G2249><s%> are weak <S%G772><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are strong <S%G2478><s%>; ye <S%G5210><s%> have glory <S%G1741><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have dishonor <S%G820><s%>.

Even unto <S%G891><s%> this present <S%G737><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> we <S%G3983><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> hunger <S%G3983><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thirst <S%G1372><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are naked <S%G1130><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are buffeted <S%G2852><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have no certain dwelling-place <S%G790><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> we toil <S%G2872><s%>, working <S%G2038><s%> with our own <S%G2398><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>: being reviled <S%G3058><s%>, we bless <S%G2127><s%>; being persecuted <S%G1377><s%>, we endure <S%G430><s%>;

being defamed <S%G987><s%>, we entreat <S%G3870><s%>: we are made <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the filth <S%G4027><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, the offscouring <S%G4067><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%>, even until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%>.

I write <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to shame <S%G1788><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to admonish <S%G3560><s%> you as <S%G5613><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> ten thousand <S%G3463><s%> tutors <S%G3807><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, yet <S%G235><s%> have ye not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>.
I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, be ye <S%G1096><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of me <S%G3450><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> have I sent <S%G3992><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> shall put <S%G363><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in remembrance <S%G363><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%> which are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> I teach <S%G1321><s%> everywhere <S%G3837><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> church <S%G1577><s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> are puffed up <S%G5448><s%>, as though <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3450><s%> were <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> shortly <S%G5030><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will <S%G2309><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> I will know <S%G1097><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of them that <S%G3588><s%> are puffed up <S%G5448><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> will ye <S%G2309><s%>? shall I come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of gentleness <S%G4236><s%>?
